title: The Oldham Riots:  Episode 48
description: In the summer of 2001 , northern cities in the UK experienced terrifying riots.  In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast, we examine the events in the town of Oldham.   What caused the riot and what were the repercussions?
